name: 1Pillar
description:
Using your character's ability to expel mass into a single solid pillar, you must escape 12 short puzzle-platforming challenges to find freedom.

Controls: A-D to move. SPACE to jump. W to wall grab. SHIFT to pillar.

The first 2 levels are basically tutorial. Have fun from there!

To those who make it to the end, try pillaring multiple times.

#gmtkjam
